original: 10 Indriyayamaka
analyzed: indriya yamaka

original: 10.3 Pariññāvāra
analyzed: pariññāvāra

original: 10.3.3. Anāgatavāra
analyzed: anāgatavāra

original: 10.3.3.1. Anuloma
analyzed: anuloma

original: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ parijānissati so domanassindriyaṁ pajahissatīti?
analyzed: yaḥ cakkhu indriyam parijānissati saḥ domanassa indriyam pajahissati iti

original: Dve puggalā cakkhundriyaṁ parijānissanti, no ca domanassindriyaṁ pajahissanti. Pañca puggalā cakkhundriyañca parijānissanti domanassindriyañca pajahissanti.
analyzed: dve puggalā cakkhu indriyam parijānissanti no ca domanassa indriyam pajahissanti pañca puggalā cakkhu indriyam ca parijānissanti domanassa indriyam ca pajahissanti

original: Yo vā pana domanassindriyaṁ pajahissati so cakkhundriyaṁ parijānissatīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana domanassa indriyam pajahissati saḥ cakkhu indriyam parijānissati iti āmantā

original: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ parijānissati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvessatīti?
analyzed: yaḥ cakkhu indriyam parijānissati saḥ anaññātaññassāmīti indriyam bhāvessati iti

original: Cha puggalā cakkhundriyaṁ parijānissanti, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvessanti.
analyzed: cha puggalā cakkhu indriyam parijānissanti no ca anaññātaññassāmīti indriyam bhāvessanti

original: Ye puthujjanā maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti te cakkhundriyañca parijānissanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca bhāvessanti.
analyzed: ye puthujjanāḥ maggam paṭilabhissanti te cakkhu indriyam ca parijānissanti anaññātaññassāmi itindriyam ca bhāvessanti

original: Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvessati so cakkhundriyaṁ parijānissatīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana anaññātaññassāmi iti indriyam bhāvessati saḥ cakkhu indriyam parijānissati iti āmantā

original: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ parijānissati so aññindriyaṁ bhāvessatīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ cakkhu indriyam parijānissati saḥ aññindriyam bhāvessati iti āmantā

original: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ bhāvessati so cakkhundriyaṁ parijānissatīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana aññindriyam bhāvessati saḥ cakkhu indriyam parijānissati iti āmantā

original: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ parijānissati so aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarissatīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ cakkhu indriyam parijānissati saḥ aññātāvindriyam sacchikarissati iti āmantā

original: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarissati so cakkhundriyaṁ parijānissatīti?
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana aññātāvindriyam sacchikarissati saḥ cakkhu indriyam parijānissati iti

original: Aggamaggasamaṅgī aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarissati, no ca cakkhundriyaṁ parijānissati.
analyzed: aggamagga samaṅgī aññātāvindriyam sacchikarissati no ca cakkhu indriyam parijānissati

original: Satta puggalā aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarissanti cakkhundriyañca parijānissanti.
analyzed: satta puggalā aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarissanti cakkhu indriyañca parijānissanti

original: (Cakkhundriyamūlakaṁ.)
analyzed: cakkhu indriya mūlaka

original: Yo domanassindriyaṁ pajahissati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvessatīti?
analyzed: yaḥ domanassa indriyam pajahissati saḥ anaññātaññassāmītindriyam bhāvessati iti

original: Cattāro puggalā domanassindriyaṁ pajahissanti, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvessanti.
analyzed: cattāro puggalāḥ domanassindriyam pajahissanti no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyam bhāvessanti

original: Ye puthujjanā maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti te domanassindriyañca pajahissanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca bhāvessanti.
analyzed: ye puthujjanāḥ maggam paṭilabhissanti te domanassindriyam ca pajahissanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyam ca bhāvessanti

original: Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvessati so domanassindriyaṁ pajahissatīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana anaññātaññassāmi itindriyam bhāvessati saḥ domanassindriyam pajahissati iti āmantā

original: Yo domanassindriyaṁ pajahissati so aññindriyaṁ bhāvessatīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ domanassindriyam pajahissati saḥ aññindriyam bhāvessati iti āmantā

original: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ bhāvessati so domanassindriyaṁ pajahissatīti?
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana aññindriyam bhāvessati saḥ domanassindriyam pajahissati iti

original: Dve puggalā aññindriyaṁ bhāvessanti no ca domanassindriyaṁ pajahissanti, pañca puggalā aññindriyañca bhavissanti domanassindriyañca pajahissanti.
analyzed: dve puggalāḥ aññindriyam bhāvessanti no ca domanassindriyam pajahissanti pañca puggalāḥ aññindriyam ca bhavissanti domanassindriyam ca pajahissanti

original: Yo domanassindriyaṁ pajahissati so aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarissatīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ domanassa indriyam pajahissati saḥ aññātāvindriyam sacchikarissati iti āmantā

original: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarissati so domanassindriyaṁ pajahissatīti?
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana aññātāvindriyam sacchikarissati saḥ domanassindriyam pajahissati iti

original: Tayo puggalā aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarissanti, no ca domanassindriyaṁ pajahissanti.
analyzed: tayo puggalā aññātau indriyam sacchikarissanti no ca domanassa indriyam pajahissanti

original: Pañca puggalā aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarissanti domanassindriyañca pajahissanti.
analyzed: pañca puggalā aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarissanti domanassindriyañca pajahissanti

original: (Domanassindriyamūlakaṁ.)
analyzed: domanassindriya mūlaka

original: Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvessati so aññindriyaṁ bhāvessatīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ anaññātaññassāmītindriyam bhāvessati saḥ aññindriyam bhāvessati iti āmantā

original: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ bhāvessati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvessatīti?
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana aññindriyam bhāvessati saḥ anaññātaññassāmītindriyam bhāvessati iti

original: Cha puggalā aññindriyaṁ bhāvessanti, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvessanti.
analyzed: cha puggalāḥ aññindriyam bhāvessanti no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyam bhāvessanti

original: Ye puthujjanā maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti te aññindriyañca bhāvessanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca bhāvessanti.
analyzed: ye puthujjanāḥ maggam paṭilabhissanti te aññ indriyam ca bhāvessanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyam ca bhāvessanti

original: Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvessati so aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarissatīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ anaññātaññassāmi iti indriyam bhāvessati saḥ aññātau indriyam sacchikarissati iti āmantā

original: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarissati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvessatīti?
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana aññātau indriyam sacchikarissati saḥ anaññātaññassāmi iti indriyam bhāvessati iti

original: Satta puggalā aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarissanti, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvessanti.
analyzed: satta puggalāḥ aññātau indriyam sacchikarissanti no ca bhāvessanti

original: Ye puthujjanā maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti te aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarissanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca
analyzed: ye puthujjanāḥ maggam paṭilabhissanti te aññātau indriyam ca sacchikarissanti

original: bhāvessanti. (Anaññātaññassāmītindriyamūlakaṁ.)
analyzed: bhāvessanti

original: Yo aññindriyaṁ bhāvessati so aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarissatīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ aññindriyam bhāvessati saḥ aññātāvindriyam sacchikarissati iti āmantā

original: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarissati so aññindriyaṁ bhāvessatīti?
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana aññātāvindriyam sacchikarissati saḥ aññindriyam bhāvessati iti

original: Aggamaggasamaṅgī aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarissati, no ca aññindriyaṁ bhāvessati. Satta puggalā aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarissanti aññindriyañca bhāvessanti. (Aññindriyamūlakaṁ.)
analyzed: aggamagga samaṅgī aññātāvindriyam sacchikarissati no ca aññindriyam bhāvessati satta puggalā aññātāvindriyam ca sacchikarissanti aññindriyam ca bhāvessanti aññindriya mūlaka

original: 10.3.3.2. Paccanīka
analyzed: paccanīka

original: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānissati so domanassindriyaṁ nappajahissatīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ cakkhu indriyam na parijānissati saḥ domanassindriyam na ppajahissati iti āmantā

original: Yo vā pana domanassindriyaṁ nappajahissati so cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānissatīti?
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana domanassa indriyam na pajahissati so cakkhu indriyam na parijānissati iti

original: Dve puggalā domanassindriyaṁ nappajahissanti, no ca cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānissanti. Tayo puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahissanti cakkhundriyañca na parijānissanti.
analyzed: dve puggalā domanassindriyam na pajahissanti no ca cakkhundriyam na parijānissanti tayo puggalā domanassindriyam ca na pajahissanti cakkhundriyam ca na parijānissanti

original: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānissati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvessatīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ cakkhu indriyam na parijānissati saḥ anaññātaññassāmītindriyam na bhāvessati iti āmantā

original: Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvessati so cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānissatīti.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyam na bhāvessati so cakkhu indriyam na parijānissati iti

original: Cha puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvessanti, no ca cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānissanti.
analyzed: cha puggalāḥ anaññātaññassāmītindriyam na bhāvessanti no ca cakkhundriyam na parijānissanti

original: Tayo puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvessanti cakkhundriyañca na parijānissanti.
analyzed: tayo puggalāḥ cakkhu indriyañca na parijānissanti

original: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānissati so aññindriyaṁ na bhāvessatīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ cakkhu indriyam na parijānissati saḥ aññindriyam na bhāvessati iti āmantā

original: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ na bhāvessati so cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānissatīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana aññindriyam na bhāvessati saḥ cakkhu indriyam na parijānissati iti āmantā

original: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānissati so aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissatīti?
analyzed: yaḥ cakkhu indriyam na parijānissati saḥ aññātāvindriyam na sacchikarissati iti

original: Aggamaggasamaṅgī cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānissati, no ca aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissati. Dve puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānissanti aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarissanti.
analyzed: aggamagga samaṅgī cakkhu indriyam na parijānissati no ca aññātāvindriyam na sacchikarissati dve puggalā cakkhu indriyam ca na parijānissanti aññātāvindriyam ca na sacchikarissanti

original: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissati so cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānissatīti? Āmantā. (Cakkhundriyamūlakaṁ.)
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana aññātāvindriyam na sacchikarissati saḥ cakkhu indriyam na parijānissati iti āmantā cakkhu indriya mūlaka

original: Yo domanassindriyaṁ nappajahissati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvessatīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ domanassa indriyam na ppajahissati saḥ anaññātaññassāmīti indriyam na bhāvessati iti āmantā

original: Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvessati so domanassindriyaṁ nappajahissatīti?
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyam na bhāvessati so domanassindriyam na ppajahissati iti

original: Cattāro puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvessanti, no ca domanassindriyaṁ
analyzed: cattāro puggalāḥ anaññātaññassāmītindriyam na bhāvessanti no ca domanassindriya

original: nappajahissanti. Pañca puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvessanti domanassindriyañca nappajahissanti.
analyzed: na ppajahissanti pañca puggalāḥ anaññātaññassāmi itindriyañca na bhāvessanti domanassindriyañca na ppajahissanti

original: Yo domanassindriyaṁ nappajahissati so aññindriyaṁ na bhāvessatīti?
analyzed: yaḥ domanassindriyam na pajahissati saḥ aññindriyam na bhāvessati iti

original: Dve puggalā domanassindriyaṁ nappajahissanti, no ca aññindriyaṁ na bhāvessanti. Tayo puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahissanti aññindriyañca na bhāvessanti.
analyzed: dve puggalā domanassindriyam na ppajahissanti no ca aññindriyam na bhāvessanti tayo puggalā domanassindriyam ca na ppajahissanti aññindriyam ca na bhāvessanti

original: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ na bhāvessati so domanassindriyaṁ nappajahissatīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana aññindriyam na bhāvessati saḥ domanassindriyam na ppajahissati iti āmantā

original: Yo domanassindriyaṁ nappajahissati so aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissatīti?
analyzed: yaḥ domanassa indriyam na ppajahissati saḥ aññātāvindriyam na sacchikarissati iti

original: Tayo puggalā domanassindriyaṁ nappajahissanti, no ca aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissanti. Dve puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahissanti aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarissanti.
analyzed: tayo puggalā domanassindriyam na ppajahissanti no ca aññātāvindriyam na sacchikarissanti dve puggalā domanassindriyam ca na ppajahissanti aññātāvindriyam ca na sacchikarissanti

original: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissati so domanassindriyaṁ nappajahissatīti? Āmantā. (Domanassindriyamūlakaṁ.)
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana aññātāvindriyam na sacchikarissati saḥ domanassindriyam na ppajahissati iti āmantā domanassindriya mūlaka

original: Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvessati so aññindriyaṁ na bhāvessatīti?
analyzed: yaḥ anaññātaññassāmītindriyam na bhāvessati saḥ aññindriyam na bhāvessati iti

original: Cha puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvessanti, no ca aññindriyaṁ na bhāvessanti. Tayo puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvessanti aññindriyañca na bhāvessanti.
analyzed: cha puggalāḥ anaññātaññassāmi iti indriyam na bhāvessanti no ca aññindriyam na bhāvessanti tayo puggalāḥ anaññātaññassāmi iti indriyam ca na bhāvessanti aññindriyam ca na bhāvessanti

original: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ na bhāvessati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvessatīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana aññindriyam na bhāvessati saḥ anaññātaññassāmītindriyam na bhāvessati iti āmantā

original: Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvessati so aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissatīti?
analyzed: yaḥ anaññātaññassāmi iti indriyam na bhāvessati saḥ aññātau indriyam na sacchikarissati iti

original: Satta puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvessanti, no ca aññātāvindriyaṁ na
analyzed: satta puggalāḥ anaññātaññassāmi iti indriyam na bhāvessanti no ca aññātāvindriyam na

original: sacchikarissanti. Dve puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvessanti aññātāvindriyañca
analyzed: sacchikarissanti dve puggalā anaññātaññassāmi iti indriyañca na bhāvessanti aññātāvindriyañca

original: na sacchikarissanti.
analyzed: na sacchikarissanti

original: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvessatīti? Āmantā. (Anaññātaññassāmītindriyamūlakaṁ.)
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana aññātau indriyam na sacchikarissati saḥ anaññātaññassāmi iti indriyam na bhāvessati iti āmantā anaññātaññassāmi iti indriya mūlaka

original: Yo aññindriyaṁ na bhāvessati so aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissatīti?
analyzed: yaḥ aññindriyam na bhāvessati saḥ aññātāvindriyam na sacchikarissati iti

analyzed: aggamagga samaṅgī aññindriyam na bhāvessati no ca aññātāvindriyam na sacchikarissati dve puggalā aññindriyam ca na bhāvessanti aññātāvindriyam ca na sacchikarissanti

original: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissati so aññindriyaṁ na bhāvessatīti? Āmantā. (Aññindriyamūlakaṁ.)
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana aññātāvindriyam na sacchikarissati saḥ aññindriyam na bhāvessati iti āmantā aññindriya mūlaka
